name: Asylum (itch) (nighthunt)
description:
Hello.This is my first game.It is an fps horror game.It contains 2 levels and is currently a demo.I want the 3rd level to be an open world but i am not happy with how the previous level turned out.Could you give it a try and tell me what you think?

Nothing is final but there wont be any major changes to those 2 levels.

If you find and bugs or problems in general with the lightning,texts etc.. let me know.
